title: The provisions of higher FSI mentioned in Chapter - 7 of these Regulations shall apply to the above buildings listed in the said chapter
clause_text: The provisions of higher FSI mentioned in Chapter - 7 of these Regulations shall apply to the above buildings listed in the said chapter. However, higher FSI in such case shall not exceed 100% of the above.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
